Reviews.Title: “Con Job”
Reviews.Author: AkshatKedia
Reviews.Content: We contacted the hotel through our company to get a corporate rate, which they offered to us at AED 850 saying that it was the best available rate for an executive double room. They said standard rooms are not available. In good faith, we booked it. On checking in, we checked with the reception on the rack rate for a executive double room and we were told it's AED 650 and that standard rooms are available in plenty. An email to the general manager of the hotel remains Un-responded. This con job by the hotel shows the quality of their mindset. Rgds Akshat Kedia

Reviews.Title: “Excelent accomodation”
Reviews.Author: Maria S
Reviews.Content: Hi, We were hosted by Byblos Marina Hotel in Dubai on Februarry 2012. The location is excelent, nice staff and excellent meal. Our room has a beautiful view to the Yacht Club. Very close to the tub station and also to the beach (the public one). People very friendy and polite. We had a nice time there. Enjoy !

Reviews.Title: “very friendly”
Reviews.Author: AllyODB
Reviews.Content: Booked 2 nights during our stay on return home, through a travel agent in australia. Upon arrival, we were greeted with friendly staff. Once at reception, we were informed our booking had not gone through, and there were no rooms available. They quickly booked us in at their sister hotel 10 mins down the road and arranged the shuttle to take us there. We returned for the second night and had to wait a little while for check in as it was the check out time. But room is clean, very friendly staff. Poolside staff did not understand english very well, but finally got it through! Very good experience!

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: haystacks
Reviews.Content: Booked by our friends who live in the Emirates, it was $200 for three nights! Well worth it for a 4-star hotel that was well situated near the marina. We were on the seventh floor (I think) and there was no tobacco smell at all. The room was clean and the breakfast buffet was excellent; all in all it's a good value hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Smelly hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: 77SAJ
Reviews.Content: Started off well, with a no nonsense early check in and in a good location but then went down hill... The whole floor (3) smelled of stale cigarette smoke and so did the room....awful! Upon checking out, my word that I had not used the mini bar clearly was not good enough for the hotel staff - who insisted on getting someone to check this was the case! It took about 20 minutes just to check out.....its great that a large hotel like this can basically call their guests liars!! What great customer service!! On another, somewhat side note - the gym (fitness centre!!) in the hotel is poor.

Reviews.Title: “Close to everything you need....”
Reviews.Author: WezT
Reviews.Content: Marina district is brilliant. Lots of places to eat and walk around. The pool is a little small but has a fantastic view of the skyscrapers. Not like you could miss them. Marina mall is a 10 minute walk away. Although it was the smallest of the malls we went to, it still had enough shopping to keep you satisfied. The beds were nice, the decour was fine. The bar downstairs was full of people, a lively night in was had by all. I'm giving it 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: “Great location in Marina district of Dubai”
Reviews.Author: Kerzy
Reviews.Content: Spent a week here in February and enjoyed every minute. The hotel is located in the Marina district of Dubai and is a perfect location for the beach, restaurants, yacht club and Dubai Metro (easy to use to get to other main parts of the city including the airport). Non-smoking room was comfortable and clean, looked on to Marina and yachts. Roof top pool good, in the shade mid afternoon but not really a problem. On site restaurants and bar fine, although found breakfast a little expensive for what we had, probably better to go to one of the local eateries near the beach. Found a greet little supermarket (Amalyos I think), just around the corner to the right of the entrance, open 24 hours, serves great vegetable samosas! All in all a great little find.

Reviews.Title: “Cosy”
Reviews.Author: Nisrinette
Reviews.Content: Very good hotel quality 4 stars as 5. Strategic location. Welcoming staff; and cleanness. The view is perfect; There's a pool on the roof, it's small but gives the view to all Dubai skyscrapers.

Reviews.Title: “Great location - 5 mins walk to Metro”
Reviews.Author: Dano2011186605
Reviews.Content: Just back from Dubai after spending Christmas/New Year at the Marina Byblos. Good 4 star hotel, good location with all the trimmings of a 5 star in your room including teasmaid/bathrobe etc. Room rate excellent value. Bedroom decor lovely, clean and bed very comfortable. Good facilities - English Bar with bands most nights, Amadeus Bar with beautiful music played by a quartet every night. Staff very attentative and helpful. Especially Darrin. Girls in business centre also very helpful and pleasant. If you do not require the full breakfast at hotel, pop across the road from hotel to Bobs fish & chip shop where they are very happy to accommodate any kind of breakfast request. - they open 7am and close approx 4am! I would definitely stay here again, however, unfortunately I would be slow to recommend it because of the noise from the disco at night. It didnt keep my husband and I awake at night but we did hear other guests complaining about the loud music. If going on tours, company which hotel use very expensive - nearly doubt price of other companies. Check around. We went on the dessert safari for 130 dmr each whereas hotel charging 250 and also did city tour by private car for 150 instead of 250 charged by hotel.

Reviews.Title: “great location!”
Reviews.Author: TatianaAbuDhabi
Reviews.Content: The hotel is in a very good location, modern & well run 4 stars hotel. The rooms were very nice, clean and comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “good location, high quality”
Reviews.Author: farahSA
Reviews.Content: it's really nice hotel with a very good price, near to the walk and the beach. high tech. there's a bar with 4 violin players which's really nice and I highly recommend it for those who love classic music. one thing that I was disappointed with and it's not to the standard of the place is the receptionist at the massage center, she wasn't enthusiastic to work. another thing there was no basket of fruit in the room nor a bath robe. other than that it's a nice hotel with great location.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel”
Reviews.Author: janet0401
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very nice as it is new. Some of the bars it advertised in it weren't open bu the English pub was great. The staff seem to be a bit disorganised and it took 40 minutes to get a continental breakfast as room service. Breakfast buffet is excellent with a chef cooking eggs for you while you wait. Rooms are spacious and clean with comfy beds. It is a bit away from the centre but would probably stay there again for the right price.

Reviews.Title: “Awsome”
Reviews.Author: Al_mobtali
Reviews.Content: Hi , ive been to several 5 stars hotels during my travells , and myself i do work in the hospitality industy, however during my last visit to dubai ( with my family 2 adults & 2 children) we decided to stay in the mentioned above hotel as we drove by car from Doha Qatar the hotel was fantastic, the employees are 5* training oriented, very helpfull , smiling all the time, although they were running full occupancy , the valet parking & concierge were very much aware about the city and helped me a lot whenever i asked them about a certain destination. the manager at the morning breakfast buffet exceeds the miles, he is very much guest oriented starting the minute we enter to have our breakfast till we leave. The Chaikofski bar manager was checking every table in her outlet to check if the guests are satisfied and happy ( she is Awsome and fantastic ) the English pub at the lobby is fantastic, the decoration is unique you think yourself at the midages travelled by time to Henry the 8th Era. although it is a 4 star rated hotel but the service and the wellcoming i had during my stay was over my expectations, and honestly i didnt see it in some 5 stars hotels i stayed in. it worth the price we paid for the stay The People who are running the hotel are doing a great job in training, follow ups, handling guests complaints, well done guys ill recommend your hotel to all my contacts, and whenever im at Dubai ill stay in Marina Byblos Hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Arabella80
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Marina Byblos for 6 days in November and very much enjoyed my stay there. The stuff is so hospitable and helpful, everybody is smiling. The roof recreation area is stylish, comfortable and with a grea view: the pool is quite big, there are comfy sunbeds, towels, u can order food or drinks. There is variety of food for breakfast. Room's facilities and design is also excellent. I ordered from in-dinding menu couple times and the meal was delicious. i like the area where the hotel is: there is supermarket one minute away, amazing view to marina in couple minutes reach (I personnaly think it is one of the most beautiful views in Dubai) and public beach in 10 min walk. Nearby there is also aphgani-paki restaurant with fantastic and not expensive meal (it's just under the bridge).For those who need to use tube, it is in 5 min walk. Overall, I enjoyed my stay at Marina Byblos and I think they have excellent price-quality balance. I even woud rate them as 5 stars hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good value but with minor teething issues”
Reviews.Author: dangerman_yyz
Reviews.Content: On the whole, I found this hotel pretty good for the price I paid. (Best price is to log on to their site) Major Pros: 1. location (near malls, public transport, massage, yacht club) 2. staff very friendly Minor annoyances came from: 1. drivers not knowing where it is (so just tell them the Yacht Club) 2. slightly cumbersome check-in process 3. issues with hot water - to their credit, they were quick to try and address for us 4. only a few floors that were non-smoking

Reviews.Title: “perfect location and lovely hotel”
Reviews.Author: fayke
Reviews.Content: having just got back from Dubai we thought we would try out the marina byblos hotel being only 3 months old you will find that majority of taxi's do not know where this is and you will end up driving all over the city so my advise it to say its near the waves hotel or the yacht club. On arrival we were welcomed with a fresh glass of juice and a cold flannel and excellent service. Our room was spectacular with views of the marina, everything is new and beds are very comfortable, bathrooms are very trendy and very clean and the little gadget by your bed that controls all the lighting in the room and air con is most impressive. Tv has alot of choice of english channels, only problem we had was the internet was extremely slow and of course its not free and our hot watter took about 20 minutes in the evening to heat up to have a shower, the daytime it was fine. Didnt hear a thing from other rooms and love the fact you can litterally smoke anywhere in the building as well as your room and the english pub. food is superb espescially the buffet and the english pub does excellent food but make sure you are hungry as the portions are for a family of 5 i think lol and really good food ! there is an excellent band that play there on thurs & fri nights and it was the best live band I have ever been to, the singer was amazing and alot of the songs were upto date songs, the bar is huge and was packed with a really good friendly atmosphere, everyone was dancing by the end of the night well 3am. bar staff are excellent and I always had a drink in my hand as they wait on you 24/7. Drinks are expensive so be warned but thats what it is like in most of the bars out there. The swimming pool on the roof top is beautiful and lots of shade if needed with very comfortable sun loungers, pool was perfect temperture too. I highly reccommend this hotel and when myself and my husband go to live out there I will definitely be a regular at the english pub and will reccomend this hotel to family and friends.

HotelInfo.Name: Marina Byblos Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Dubai Marina, Dubai 123233, United Arab Emirates
